column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Let's start with the ambience...there are 3 doors before you can be greeted by a kind lady. Then another door before you meet your hostess. Because you are early (of course) you are directed towards the bar. Service at the bar is nothing short of excellent! They greet you promptly with coat check and a delicious girly cosmopolitan! Step back we are in heaven!
